title: 各位打末影龙都有啥技巧
author: fuckwuzui
txt_content: 一般我都是跟小伙伴组队去打，一个人无力啊。。弓箭赖不了，那个加血的魔球太恶心。。而且数量还那么多。。一个个叠上去，说不定半空中被魔影龙偷袭，各位都怎么打的？

replies.author: 咕噜and呼噜
replies.txt_content: 本人直接用水淹死论坛末影龙2333333333333
搞一个空中堡垒和末影龙对着干

replies.author: fuckwuzui
replies.txt_content:
2499899373 发表于 2015-5-9 13:05
搞一个空中堡垒和末影龙对着干
末影龙有墙体穿透伤害的

replies.author: fuckwuzui
replies.txt_content:
咕噜and呼噜 发表于 2015-5-9 12:57
本人直接用水淹死论坛末影龙2333333333333
无语。。。

replies.author: 咕噜and呼噜
replies.txt_content:
fuckwuzui 发表于 2015-5-9 13:11
无语。。。
kill @e直接解决
不然用这个？

replies.author: fuckwuzui
replies.txt_content:
咕噜and呼噜 发表于 2015-5-9 13:12
kill @e直接解决
不然用这个？
我去。。这武器你怎么做的？求教

replies.author: 咕噜and呼噜
replies.txt_content:
fuckwuzui 发表于 2015-5-9 13:12
我去。。这武器你怎么做的？求教
必须是1.7的而且必须写在命令方块里

/give 用户名 261 1 0 {AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:9000000000.0,AttributeName:generic.attackDamage,Name:Attack},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:2,UUIDMost:2,Amount:9000000000.0,AttributeName:generic.knockbackResistance,Name:Knockback},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:3,UUIDMost:3,Amount:1000.0,AttributeName:generic.followRange,Name:Follow},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:4,UUIDMost:4,Amount:1000.0,AttributeName:generic.maxHealth,Name:Health},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:5,UUIDMost:5,Amount:0.1,AttributeName:generic.movementSpeed,Name:Speed}],ench:[{id:48,lvl:90000},{id:49,lvl:90000},{id:50,lvl:90000},{id:51,lvl:90000},{id:34,lvl:90000}],display:{Name:"killer bow",Lore:["the killer bow""by 咕噜and呼噜"]}}复制代码

replies.author: MC........
replies.txt_content: 直接/kill @e[type=EnderDragon]

replies.author: 北极喧嚣丶
replies.txt_content: 网上搜一大坨

replies.author: 草
replies.txt_content:
9组雪球射的稍微准点就能把所有末影水晶带走
接下来打末影龙就easy多了

replies.author: 吠犬
replies.txt_content: 床炸。。。很简单- -

replies.author: YueHaxgu
replies.txt_content:
吠犬 发表于 2015-5-9 14:15
床炸。。。很简单- -
表示不会啊

replies.txt_content:
hurui 发表于 2015-5-9 14:18
表示不会啊
在自己前面放两原石，再放床，等他过来右键就好了

replies.author: zhangyi991120
replies.txt_content: 先用弓箭把回血的魔球射爆，然后再拿弓箭跟末影龙对干

replies.author: Titis
replies.txt_content:
/killall
简单明了

replies.author: MFKirby
replies.txt_content:
雪傀儡海堆死。
遇到比较高的黑曜石塔，扔几颗末影珍珠上去。
食物带上金苹果。
